---
id: list-templates
title: "List templates"
description: "This endpoint returns a paginated list of templates that are associated with a specific object type within a space. Templates provide pre‑configured structures for creating new objects. Each template record contains its identifier, name, and icon, so that clients can offer users a selection of templates when creating objects."
sidebar_label: "List templates"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/reference/2025-04-22/anytype-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List templates"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/types/{type_id}/templates"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint returns a paginated list of templates that are associated with a specific object type within a space. Templates provide pre‑configured structures for creating new objects. Each template record contains its identifier, name, and icon, so that clients can offer users a selection of templates when creating objects.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

</Heading>
